I got it to load the old save file.
First fix the corrupted save file with this.
http://forums.runicgames.com/viewtopic.php?f=30&t=35698&p=322365#p322365

After starting the Torchlight2_Steam.exe and making a new character, exit the game, and go to 
Documents/My Games/Runic Games/Documents/My Games/Runic Games/Torchlight 2/Save/

There should now be 2 folders named with strings of numbers
Copy the content of the folder containing your old character into the new one and once you start your game it should be available there for you to load.

This is the worst crack I've ever dled, the installer is fucking terrible, for starters it defaults the folder as "Torchlight 2" when it should be 'Torchlight II" then even after picking the proper destination folder it creates a new 'Torchlight 2' folder, and you have to manually move everything itno the right folder. 

All that and it still doesn't work properly, it displays the wrong version and you claim is actually the 1.11.5.1 version yet when I try to play with person using that version I'm given the wrong version error. Fuck THETA never heard of you before today, wish it stayed that way. Absoultely terrible I'll wait for Skidrow or Reloaded cause this is absoulte shit.
